Type of Project

Internship at Samsung Research Institute, Bangalore

Time of Project

May 2017 - Jul 2017

Program

View Project

Samsung's Philosphy

Project started with a clear understanding of Samsung's philosophy. There are 3 pillars of Samsung's philosophy.

Meaningful Innovation
Samsung envisions innovative designs that integrate cutting edge technology with personal value to create devices that deliver a purposeful consumer driven experience.
Minimal Futurism
Samsung's strategy is to find a perfect combination of technology and design while retaining both a futuristic and minimal look and feel.
Harmonized Presence
Samsung's devices and solutions are a step towards achieving an ecosystem where each pne of them co-exist harmonipously.

Secondary Research

Secondary research was done, reading through research papers and popular reports like Gartner, Google Trends, Samsung Internal Reports. An analysis of existing trends in the market was also done.

Reports

Market Research

Research Papers

Social, Technology and Business Trends were analyzed out of these artifacts which set the goal of user interview.

Social, Technology and Business Trends
